overview: Immersion among "Les Bleus" during the EURO 2016, international football competition which take place in France in summer 2016.  Trainings, day-to-day life, tactical discussions, talks before the games or instructions at hafl-times: Didier Deschamps' squad confide in us like hardly ever.
tagline: football french national team bleus euro 2016
title: Euro 2016 : Au coeur des Bleus
